bibl.title: Antipater of Tarsus on False 'Phantasiai' (PBerol inv. 16545).

series.title: Studi e testi per il Corpus dei papiri filosofici greci e latini.

bibl.note: P. Berol. Inv. 16545 [ed.: Mikolaj SZYMANSKI, P. Berol. Inv. 16545: A Text on Stoic Epistemology with a Fragment of Antipater of Tarsus, JJurP 20 (1990) pp. 139-141, 1 pl.]. - New reading and interpretation of the text. - Historical and philosophical implications of the fragment.
